text: Crime is a lot here, but the punishment is unique, always the same. The condemned is placed in an endless tunnel between the railroad tracks. From that moment on, the condemned knows what awaits him. He runs away, because he has only that chance. Allucination, because the tunnel is endless. The condemned runs to the point of losing his breath and then his life. However, it can be said that no train was ever launched on that route. FIN
title: El castigo
author: Jacques Sternberg
